channel.title: Planning Budget Results
channel.description: Updated Planning Budget Results content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: Office of Chemical Safety and Pollution Prevention (OCSPP) Summary of Engagement on FY 2018-2019 NPM Guidance Development
item.description:
OCSPP's summary of the engagement effort to solicit input on priorities to consider in developing their FY 2018-2019 NPM Guidance.

  • Office of Chemical Safety and Pollution Prevention (OCSPP) Summary of Engagement on FY 2018-2019 NPM Guidance Development (PDF)(2 pp, 175 K, 730-S-16-001)
item.dc:creator: bhefele

item.title: FY 2016 Agency Financial Report
item.description:
This document contains the Environmental Protection Agency's fiscal year 2016 Agency Financial Report.

item.title: Assessment of Inaugural Two-Year NPM Guidance Process
item.description:
Assessment intended to facilitate discussions among EPA Headquarters, Regional and state staff and management -- to identify opportunities to improve the two-year process for the FY 2018-2019 NPM Guidance development.

  • Assessment of Inaugural Two-Year NPM Guidance Process (PDF)(42 pp, 593 K, July 12, 2016, 190-B-16-002)
item.dc:creator: bhefele
